input: Prepare a batch request that retrieves specific account holder change requests based on various filters.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequests?$filter=ID eq '47938' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequests?$filter=LifeCycleStatusCode eq '3' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
